channel.title: Lincoln on Yen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lincoln on Yen's blog

item.title: Hiking Mount Misery
item.description: We went for a short hike over the long Labor Day weekend. To get there we drove through very picturesque Lincoln Center. Note to self: come back here for a bike ride in the fall. The trail head is located at the back of the very unremarkable parking lot for the local commuter train station. Despite its formidable and romantic name, Mount Misery is anything but. It’s a relatively small hill which barely rises above the tree line.
